EmailTemplate.description: "(NOTE TO CC STAFF: Password MUST be at least 8 characters long and include 1 number, 1 Upper case letter, 1 lowercase letter and one symbol use this: https://passwordsgenerator.net/)"
EmailTemplate.name: Manually resetting password template - Step 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Manually resetting password- Step 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
Your password is - <JKHJHKJNLJHIUY>
For security reasons, your username has been sent to you separately. Please inform us immediately if you did not request this so that we can secure your account.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care Support Portal
